text: ye mushrikeen (yo) kahenge ke agar Allah taâ€™ala ko manzoor hota to na hum shirk karte aur na hamaare baap dada aur na hum kisi cheez ko haraam keh sakte, isi tarah jo log un se pehle ho chuke hai unhone bhi takzeeb ki thi, yaha tak ke unhone hamaare azaab ka maza chaka, aap kahiye ke kya tumhaare paas koyi dalile hai to us ko hamaare rubaro zaaher karo, tum log mahez qayaali baatho par chalte ho aur tum bil-kul atkal se baatein banaate ho
